title: 原來藍斯仔頻密入波會斷魂

replies.msg:
上星期1g1a
意大利即刻勁多死亡個案
連佢隊友都中招

The deaths 'caused' by the Welsh's goals seem to be between three days after the goal. These are the 21 people killed after Ramsey's goals, according to the newspaper As.

Andrés Montes: 14/10/2009 first goal with Wales; on 16/10/2011 the admired soccer and basketball narrator Andres Montes died.
Osama Bin Laden: 01/05/2011 goal against Manchester United; on 05/02/2011 Osama Bin Laden was killed.
Steve Jobs: On 02/10/2011 Ramsey scored a goal in Arsenal's 2-1 loss to Tottenham; on 05/10/2011 Apple co-founder Steve Jobs passed away.
